name: RePear (obriencole)
description:
Your fruity space station was just destroyed by a recent insect-asteroid shower! Try to repair your space station with the Pearship to gather floating fruit remnants and defend the station's core from incoming insect-asteroids. 

Controls: 
- Movement: arrow keys and WASD
- Shoot: Space bar 
- Interact: E
- Pause: P
- Credits: I
- Reset: Return
